entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
